content: i call them scrubbies but they can be washcloths or sponges or whatever i think they re great for a summer housewarming gift don t you oh and they work up pretty quickly supplies h 5 mm hook 3 colors yarnspirations sugar n cream cotton yarn extra scrap for eyes scissors embroidery needle abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet chain chain stitch hdc2tog half_double_crochet 2 stitches together decreasing stitch decrease single_crochet 2 stitches together decreasing stitch
